toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Item Number is the designator for a given part. Can be up to 50 characters.

toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__peitemrev_item__c

Can be up to 50 characters.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Item Number</label> <length>0</length> <lookupFilter> <active>true</active> <filterItems> <field>rstk__peitem__c.rstk__peitem_div__c</field> <operation>equals</operation> <valueField>$Source.rstk__peitemrev_div__c</valueField> </filterItems> <isOptional>false</isOptional> </lookupFilter> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__peitem__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>Engineering Item Revisions</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>PEITEMREVs</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>MasterDetail</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is an internal system field defined by the formula_extid field. Neither the formula_extid, nor the externalid field itself, is currently displayed on any Rootstock User pages.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: External Id
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__externalid__c

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Formula Ident
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__formula_ident__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__peitemrev__c.rstk__formula_ident__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <formula>rstk__peitemrev_rev__c & ", " & TEXT(MONTH(rstk__peitemrev_effdate__c)) & "/" &TEXT(DAY(rstk__peitemrev_effdate__c)) & "/" &TEXT(YEAR(rstk__peitemrev_effdate__c)) & " , " & TEXT(rstk__peitemrev_revsts_pl__c)</formula> <inlineHelpText>Formula for internal ID - not used in user process</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Formula Ident</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Text</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: Engineering Revision record for the Inventory Revision Engineering Item. When said item has a BOM already associated with it, that BOM will be copied to the Item this Revision will create.

toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__peitemrev_bomsource__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the descriptive name for this revision. For example, 'New Design', 'Phased-out Parts', etc. User defined.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Description
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__peitemrev_descr__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This value defines the ECO Number associated with this revision, if the Division is under ECO control.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: ECO Number
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__peitemrev_econo__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__peitemrev__c.rstk__peitemrev_econo__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>Restrict</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>If the Division is under ECO control, this is the ECO Number associated with this revision (read-only). toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The date this revision goes into effect.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Start Date
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__peitemrev_effdate__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the date the Status changed to Implemented. If the Division has ECO Control enabled, this date is controlled by the ECO Header (is set to the Date Implemented) and may not be changed by the user.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Date Implemented
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__peitemrev_impstsdate__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: The non-"master" Engineering counterpart that is used for inventory tracking
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Inventory Revision Engineering Item
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__peitemrev_invpeitem__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__peitemrev__c.rstk__peitemrev_invpeitem__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>SetNull</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>The non-"master" Engineering counterpart that is used for inventory tracking</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Inventory Revision Engineering Item</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>rstk__peitem__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>Engineering Item Revisions (Inventory Revision Engineering Item)</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>invpeitemrevs</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the date the Status changed to Released. If the Division has ECO Control enabled, this date is controlled by the ECO Header (is set to the Date Release) and may not be changed by the user.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Date Released
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__peitemrev_relstsdate__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This is the current revision of an Engineering Item. When a Division is under ECO Control, the Revision No is controlled by the ECO process.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Revision No
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__peitemrev_rev__c

toolingEntityParticle.InlineHelpText: This value defines the Revision Status - i)P-Pending, ii)R-Released, iii)I-Implemented. If the Division has ECO Control enabled, this status is controlled by the ECO Header(is set to the ECO Status) and may not be changed by the user.
toolingEntityParticle.Label: Revision Status
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__peitemrev_revsts_pl__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>rstk__peitemrev__c.rstk__peitemrev_revsts_pl__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Valid Values: P Pending R Released I Implemented Only IMPLEMENTED revisions are operational Pending and Released are both non-operational revisions (there are two non-implemented values for notational purposes). The default value (and the value used for the auto-created 000000 rev) is controlled by the SYDIV_INITPEITEMREVSTATUS ( Initial Engineering Item Revision Status). If the Division has ECO Control enabled, this status is controlled by the ECO Header (is set to the ECO Status) and may not be changed by the user. (DD)</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <inlineHelpText>This value defines the Revision Status - i)P-Pending, ii)R-Released, iii)I-Implemented. If the Division has ECO Control enabled, this status is controlled by the ECO Header(is set to the ECO Status) and may not be changed by the user.</inlineHelpText> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Revision Status</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>true</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Picklist</type> <unique>false</unique> <valueSet> <restricted>false</restricted> <valueSetDefinition> <sorted>false</sorted> <value> <fullName>Implemented</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Implemented</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Pending</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Pending</label> </value> <value> <fullName>Released</fullName> <default>false</default> <isActive>false</isActive> <label>Released</label> </value> </valueSetDefinition> </valueSet> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Search Index
toolingEntityParticle.Name: rstk__searchindex__c
